summary.description: AI-powered email summaries that appear at the top of each email
summary.purpose: Help users quickly understand email content without reading the full message
features: Language based on user preference (adjustable in Settings)
Embedded actions (e.g., 'Check in' buttons) included in summary
Thumbs up/down feedback icons for user experience improvement
Daily free usage limit with manual trigger option when exceeded

summary-ghost.description: Collapsed state prompting user to generate summary
summary-ghost.usage: Shown when daily limit reached or summary not yet generated

summary-ghost-caption.usage: Shown when daily free limit is reached

summary-generating.description: Loading state while AI generates summary

summary-default.description: Full summary with bullet points and actions
summary-default.usage: Primary display state showing email summary

todo.description: Auto-converted action items from emails requiring user response
todo.purpose: Ensure users never miss important tasks from their emails
features: Auto-converts actionable emails into clear, structured memos
Detail menu (view details, report incorrect, delete)

todo-inmail.description: In-email todo card with task description
todo-inmail.usage: Displayed within email view for actionable items

tips.purpose: Guide users on app status and recommended actions

tips.usage: Account disconnection alerts, feature tips, etc.

spam.description: Security warning for potentially risky emails
spam.purpose: Alert users about phishing or scam attempts

spam.description: Risk detection warning with report option
spam.usage: Shown when email has phishing/scam characteristics

tracker.description: Email tracker detection and blocking notification
tracker.purpose: Inform users about invisible trackers in promotional emails

tracker-expanded.usage: Shows full list of blocked tracker domains

ai-actions.description: AI-generated action cards for specific tasks
ai-actions.purpose: Frame AI results in focused, actionable card format

ai-draft.description: Email draft preview with send/edit options
ai-draft.usage: AI-composed email reply ready for review

ai-label.usage: AI suggests new label based on email patterns

ai-filter.description: Email filter creation with conditions and actions
ai-filter.usage: AI suggests automated email management rules

ai-todo.description: Todo item creation with date and priority
ai-todo.usage: AI extracts task from email for confirmation

ai-select.usage: Batch operations on multiple AI-generated items

backgrounds.blue: var(--filo-05) - Used for summary and todo cards
backgrounds.gray: var(--filo-14) - Used for AI actions, tips, spam, trackers
